verblex: 1. To have very little noise in a place. English = (be) quiet, (be) silent; (be) still.
interj: 1. Used alone to tell someone to stop making a noise or a commotion. English = 'Be quiet!', 'Be still!'
partlex: 1. Used immediately next to a verb to mean that the action of that verb is performed without hardly any noise or vibration at all. English = quietly, silently.
nomlex: 1. The condition or state in which there is no noise at all, and especially no talking; or in which there is no commotion. English = quiet, silence, stillness.
